perturbation.original_text:
4.
Fees for Customizations:
[SPECIFY TIME AND MATERIALS RATES ([Indicate any “not to exceed” limit on T&M Customization costs) OR FIXED PRICE]
If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter,
Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of all amounts previously paid hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.
Fees for Customizations:
[SPECIFY TIME AND MATERIALS RATES ([Indicate any “not to exceed” limit on T&M Customization costs) OR FIXED PRICE]
If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter,
Bank of America may terminate this Schedule. Any refund is at the sole discretion of the Supplier.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states Bank of America SHALL receive a refund if the price is increased and they terminate the schedule. The modified text contradicts this by stating any refund is at the sole discretion of the Supplier, creating uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text:
The Customizations shall fulfill or exceed all of the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and
the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below.
No later than <<enter Customization Documents Delivery Date>>, Supplier shall deliver to Bank of America the documents described
below for this Customization. The detailed specifications so delivered shall be incorporated herein when approved by Bank of America.
perturbation.changed_text:
The Customizations shall fulfill or exceed all of the functional, performance and other specifications described in the Program Materials and
the documents prepared either by Bank of America or Supplier pursuant to this Agreement. as indicated below.
No later than <<enter Customization Documents Delivery Date>>, Supplier shall deliver to Bank of America the documents described
below for this Customization. The detailed specifications so delivered shall be subject to change by the Supplier at any time, even after approval by Bank of America.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the detailed specifications shall be incorporated when approved by Bank of America implying that the specifications will be fixed after approval. The modified version adds that the specifications are subject to change by the Supplier at any time, even after approval, thus contradicting the intended stability after approval and creating uncertainty about the final specifications of the customization.

perturbation.original_text:
6
The Delivery and Installation Schedule for this Customization is:
Delivery Date:  
Installation Date:  
[Insert any other Schedule Information pertaining to the Delivery or Installation of the Product]
perturbation.changed_text:
6
The Delivery and Installation Schedule for this Customization is:
Delivery Date:  This date is an estimate and is not binding.
Installation Date: This date is an estimate and is not binding.
[Insert any other Schedule Information pertaining to the Delivery or Installation of the Product]
perturbation.explanation: The original text implies a firm Delivery and Installation Schedule. Adding that the dates are estimates and not binding introduces contradiction, creating uncertainty about the actual delivery and installation timelines.
